summary: Completed comprehensive testing of hotel booking platform. Backend APIs working correctly with proper authentication. Frontend UI flows functional but authentication state management has issues.

integration_issues.issue: Session cookie not being recognized by frontend auth store
integration_issues.details: Frontend useAuthStore not detecting session_token cookie properly. User remains in unauthenticated state even with valid session cookie.

passed_tests: Homepage loads correctly with hero section and search form
Hotel search functionality works (destination, dates, guests)
Search results page displays hotel cards properly
Hotel details page shows booking form with all required fields
Unauthenticated users correctly redirected to login
Backend API endpoints return correct responses
Hotel search API returns mock hotel data
Hotel details API works for individual hotels
Booking creation API works with proper authentication
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication state management. The useAuthStore is not properly detecting session_token cookies, causing authenticated users to appear as unauthenticated. This prevents access to protected routes like dashboard and payment pages.
